Template.name: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID value: '', // string textDirection: sap.ui.core.TextDirection.Inherit, // sap.ui.core.TextDirection width: undefined, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize height: undefined, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize editorType: 'TinyMCE', // string editorLocation: 'js/tiny_mce/tiny_mce_src.js', // string editable: true, // boolean showGroupFontStyle: true, // boolean showGroupTextAlign: true, // boolean showGroupStructure: true, // boolean showGroupFont: false, // boolean showGroupClipboard: true, // boolean showGroupInsert: false, // boolean showGroupLink: false, // boolean showGroupUndo: false, // boolean wrapping: true, // boolean required: false, // boolean sanitizeValue: true, // boolean tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData layoutData: undefined, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData change: [function (oEvent) { var ${control} = oEvent.getSource(); }, this], ready: [function (oEvent) { var ${control} = oEvent.getSource(); }, this] })
